name: Bubble Breaker Adventure
description:
Test your brain, you can not complete the levels by popping bubbles randomly. Bubble Breaker Adventure is a fun and addictive puzzle game. Solve hundreds of levels by matching two or more bubbles of the same color. The gameplay is simple, but getting 3 stars in each level is a good challenge.

Features
- 350 levels
- Unlimited lives
- Compete against your friends via Game Center
- Let you listen to your music on iTunes and create playlist
- Offers in-app purchases that you only need to pay one time
